tool_description: Generate ( Bitcoin ,Ethereum, Doge ) address and get access to address balance
name: Bitcoin address generator
title: Bitcoin address generator

api_list.name: bitcoin balance
api_list.description: Get the balance of an bitcoin address

api_list.name: Ethereum balance
api_list.description: Get the balance of a giver eth address

api_list.name: Doge balance
api_list.description: Get balance of a given doge address

api_list.name: Doge address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-address-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/gen_doge"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-address-generator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
